title: Kerning suggestions
content:
Hello everyone. Could you all help me out with some kerning advice. I am just starting out with design in school and have noticed that something can be very beautiful with just type that is kerned well. Unfortunately I assume it will take me years of practice to be good at it.Some professional help would be nice :) Anyway thanks! also if you have any suggestions on how to make the drop shaddow or ice type "more real" that would be nice.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100302224452im_/http:/typophile.com/files/badkerning_4800.jpg)
author: friends

comments.content: For starters you want the space between the letters to be less than the space between the lines.
